definition: puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Whisk together the sifted flour, baking powder and baking soda. Warm water and salt combined in another clean mixing bowl.
sentences.chinese: 面粉过筛后加入泡打粉和小苏打完全拌匀备用。

sentences.english: Fold in the flour and baking powder until just combined .
sentences.chinese: 轻手加入已筛面粉及泡打粉，不可过度搅拌。

sentences.english: Fold in the sieved flour and baking powder .
sentences.chinese: 拌入已筛面粉及泡打粉。

sentences.english: Add cake flour and baking powder, mix well.
sentences.chinese: 筛入低筋面粉和泡打粉，搅匀。

sentences.english: Sift flour, starch , and baking powder together in a bowl.
sentences.chinese: 面粉，淀粉和泡打粉混合在一盆里。

definition: abbr. for 低筋麵粉|低筋面粉[di1 jin1 mian4 fen3]
all-purpose flour/flour for making dumplings and noodles
